section_title: Task Group on Processes and Procedures
sentences: The IPCC established a task group to develop proposals on further implementation of the recommendations by 31 January 2011.
Governments will be invited to comment on the proposals by 28 February 2011 to allow preparation of revised drafts for consideration by the Panel at IPCC-33.
enb_long_title: Thirty-second Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC)
